title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The first point may be earned without algebraic simplification. The terms may be in a list or expressed as a sum. The signs on each term must be accurate. Extra terms or the use of +⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcqWIVlctaaa@3604@ may be ignored.

The second point may be earned without algebraic simplification. The use of sigma notation is acceptable; the index may be ignored.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The point may be earned based on an incorrect result for g ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGNbWaaeWaaeaacaWG4b aacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@36A6@ from part (a) based on a maximum of one computational error. Supporting work is required to earn the point.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include a correct value.
The student response accurately includes a correct value.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The first and second points may be earned without algebraic simplification. The terms may be in a list or expressed as a sum. The signs on each term must be accurate. Extra terms or the use of +⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcqWIVlctaaa@3604@ may be ignored. The first point is earned for any two correct terms. Special case: of the first two points, a maximum of 1 out of 2 points may be earned with a sign error on all four terms.

The third point may be earned without algebraic simplification. The use of sigma notation is acceptable; the index may be ignored.

The fourth point may be earned based on a maximum of one sign error in the first two terms.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all four of the criteria below.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
